mapper.insert: insert into T_RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY (RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, HOUSE_NUMBER, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREAT_LEASE_TIME, RETREAT_LEASE_TYPE, ARREARS_RENT, LEASE_DEPOSIT, PERMIT_RETREAT_LEASE_DEPOSIT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{retreatLeaseApplyId}, #{houseInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{houseNumber,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{houseAcreage,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{leaseStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{leaseEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{retreatLeaseTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{retreatLeaseType,jdbcType=DATE}, #{arrearsRent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{leaseDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{permitRetreatLeaseDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} )
mapper.update: update T_RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY set HOUSE_INFO_ID = #{houseInfoId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, HOUSE_NUMBER = #{houseNumber,jdbcType=OTHER}, HOUSE_ACREAGE = #{houseAcreage,jdbcType=FLOAT}, LEASE_START_TIME = #{leaseStartTime,jdbcType=DATE}, LEASE_END_TIME = #{leaseEndTime,jdbcType=DATE}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RETREAT_LEASE_TIME = #{retreatLeaseTime,jdbcType=DATE}, RETREAT_LEASE_TYPE = #{retreatLeaseType,jdbcType=DATE}, ARREARS_RENT = #{arrearsRent,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LEASE_DEPOSIT = #{leaseDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PERMIT_RETREAT_LEASE_DEPOSIT = #{permitRetreatLeaseDeposit,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE} where RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY_ID = #{retreatLeaseApplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, HOUSE_NUMBER, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREAT_LEASE_TIME, RETREAT_LEASE_TYPE, ARREARS_RENT, LEASE_DEPOSIT, PERMIT_RETREAT_LEASE_DEPOSIT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from T_RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY where RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY_ID = #{retreatLeaseApplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, HOUSE_NUMBER, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREAT_LEASE_TIME, RETREAT_LEASE_TYPE, ARREARS_RENT, LEASE_DEPOSIT, PERMIT_RETREAT_LEASE_DEPOSIT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from T_RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY

select RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY_ID, HOUSE_INFO_ID, HOUSE_NUMBER, HOUSE_ACREAGE, LEASE_START_TIME, LEASE_END_TIME, TYPE, RETREAT_LEASE_TIME, RETREAT_LEASE_TYPE, ARREARS_RENT, LEASE_DEPOSIT, PERMIT_RETREAT_LEASE_DEPOSIT, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME from T_RETREAT_LEASE_APPLY WHERE HOUSE_INFO_ID=#{houseInfoId}
